channel.title: How to remove ::pure & ::master
channel.description:
Hi there.
I got some simple questions, i bet they arent hard, its just me lol
1) How do i remove ::pure & ::master from my server? 2) the source i dled got donor crown, but it dosnt work? i made myself as donor but it wont come up when i write something?
Thank you so much <3

item.title: How to remove ::pure & ::master
item.dc:creator: @nimoo nimoo
item.description:
@nimoo wrote:

[quote=“s3x 4 u l1f3, post:4, topic:311936”][quote author=nimoo link=topic=408380.msg3014875#msg3014875 date=1257103043]
it worked, thanks

how do i fix the donor crown? please help me with that 2 <333
[/quote]
What wrong with it?[/quote]
well i dled combattscape and it says when i should add a donator into the donator files the donator should have a crown, but it dosnt appear when i did that… its kinda odd

Read full topic

item.title: How to remove ::pure & ::master
item.dc:creator: @gangsta_tony gangsta tony
item.description:
@gangsta_tony wrote:

go in into client.java and search for “master” then you should see something like
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”) && playerRights >= 1) {
addSkillXP(14910000, 0);
addSkillXP(14910000, 1);
addSkillXP(14910000, 2);
addSkillXP(14910000, 3);
addSkillXP(14910000, 4);
addSkillXP(14910000, 5);
addSkillXP(14910000, 6);
sendMessage("" + playerName + " MESSAGE HERE!");
}

Read full topic
